I found the code location and it seems this only comes up twice and only one of those looks applicable.  Furthermore, pinning to specific cores happened at a change on Aug 12, 2015.  Before that the code had an if....else that covered for fewer cores.  Can you change the values to be 0 and 1 instead of 1 and 2, then make it available?  I'd be happy to test it.
Here is the link to the code at the [ihmc github site](https://github.com/ihmcrobotics/ihmc-open-robotics-software/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=getCore)
